title: Medical Practice for prevention and holistic medicine – in Freiburg since 1996
description: Fachärzte für Allgemeinmedizin, Traditionelle europäische Medizin, Moderne Pflanzenheilkunde, Integrative Psychotherapie, Naturheilverfahren, Chirotherapie, Akupunktur und Applied Kinesiology

Medical Practice for prevention and holistic medicine
– in Freiburg since 1996
Dr. Brigitte Karner and Dr. Wolfgang Karner
Academic teaching practice of the University of Freiburg
– certified by QEP –

Dr. Wolfgang Karner
General medical practitioner, naturopathic medicine, chiropractic medicine, acupuncture, applied kinesiology, holistic pain therapy, preventive medicine

On our website you can find information on our broad, holistic therapeutic and naturopathic offers. Our focus lies on tests using Applied Kinesiology, classical homeopathy, modern plant based alternative medicine and intestinal rehabilitation
.
Furthermore we offer treatment courses to strengthen your immune system
– for cancer patients, to boost your immune function
and for detoxification
.
Vital courses for stress
and burnout
patients. Additional focus lies on naturopathic approaches for cancer treatment, allergies and pain therapy (according to Liebscher&Bracht, acupuncture, tape, osteopathy).
In psychotherapy we use behavioral therapy
, hypnosis
and family therapy
.
Prevention
is one of our core topics to prevent your having illness in the first place – “Staying healthy naturally”. In order to do so, we offer health check ups
, detoxification programs
, immune strengthening
and vital courses
, motion counseling
and nutrition counseling
; if necessary supported by a ketogenic diet.
